content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: writable_book
inventory=[{"type": "campfire", "quantity": 33, "index": 15}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 64, "index": 20}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 40, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a writable_book, I need to place a book, an ink_sac and a feather in the crafting table. The book is in slot 22, and therefore I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting table.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: writable_book
inventory=[{"type": "book", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 33, "index": 15}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 64, "index": 20}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 40, "index": 43}]
thought: The feather is in slot 27, and therefore I will move it to slot 2 in the crafting table.
act: move from slot 27 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: writable_book
inventory=[{"type": "book", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 33, "index": 15}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 64, "index": 20}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 40, "index": 43}]
thought: The ink_sac is in slot 35, and therefore I will move it to slot 3 in the crafting table.
act: move from slot 35 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: writable_book
inventory=[{"type": "writable_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 33, "index": 15}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 64, "index": 20}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 40, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the writable_book by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
